author: hwright
msg: JavaHL: Fix one of the thin wrappers in the SVNClient class.  This wrapper
adds the ignoreExternals parameter, but doesn't make any use of it.  It ought
to.
* subversion/bindings/java/javahl/src/org/tigris/subversion/javahl/SVNClient.java
(update):  Make use of the ignoreExternals parameter, instead of defaulting to
false.

author: dlr
msg: Fix validation of a WC entry's working size field.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/entries.c
(read_entry): If a WC entry has no working_size field in the entries
file, use its default (set when the entry is created) instead of
erroring out.
Patch by: ehu
(Tweaked by me.)

author: xsteve
msg: Support for reloading psvn.el if an older version is already in use
* trunk/contrib/client-side/emacs/psvn.el:
(svn-prepare-for-reload): New function that resets some variables that
are otherwise not touched when reloading psvn.el. This function is
intended to be used, when an older version of psvn.el is already
loaded by your emacs startup and you want to load a newer version.
It alows to use the newer keybindings.

author: dlr
msg: On the sparse-directories branch: Bring up to date with trunk at r23900.

author: hwright
msg: JavaHL: Remove another largely redundant overloaded function in the native
client class.   Related to r23901.
[ in subversion/bindings/java/javahl/native/ ]
* SVNClient.cpp,
SVNClient.h
(propertySet): Remove on overloaded instance of this function.
* org_tigris_subversion_javahl_SVNClient.cpp
(Java_org_tigris_subversion_javahl_SVNClient_propertySet__Ljava_lang_String_2Ljava_lang_String_2_3BZ):
Adjust to use the remaining public incarnation of SVNClient::propertySet().
